Skill.Name: Fierce Light
Skill.Description: Deals small Light element damage to one enemy using spear of light.

Skill.Name: Light Call
Skill.Description: Call down light of punishment, dealing medium Light element damage to one enemy.

Skill.Name: Blaze Shot
Skill.Description: Shoot a Gigantic fireball to an enemy, dealing strong Fire element damage.

Skill.Name: Thunder Blade
Skill.Description: Store the power of a lightning bolt and slash one enemy, dealing heavy Thunder element damage.

Skill.Name: Light Advent
Skill.Description: Call down the might of heaven, deals massive Light element damage to all enemies.

Skill.Name: Dark Viper
Skill.Description: Use forbidden arts to channel the power of Hell's Lord, deals severe Dark element damage to one enemy.

Skill.Name: Rush
Skill.Description: Charge toward all enemies, dealing small Physical damage.

Skill.Name: Fierce Wind
Skill.Description: Create a wind blade to attack the enemy. Deals medium physical damage to one enemy.

Skill.Name: Wind Call
Skill.Description: Call upon the divine wind to inflict strong Wind element damage to a single enemy.

Skill.Name: Cleaving Rush
Skill.Description: Rush all the enemy while swinging the weapon with full power. Deals strong Physical damage to all enemies.

Skill.Name: Severing Rush
Skill.Description: A Cleaving Rush with a fully powered Wind Blade, dealing heavy Wind element damage to all enemies.

Skill.Name: Wind Advent
Skill.Description: Turns the body into divine vessel for the God of Wind, deals massive Wind element damage to all enemies.

Skill.Name: Great Heal
Skill.Description: Light of Restoration heals medium health to all allies.

Skill.Name: Fierce Hydro
Skill.Description: Blast the target with a concentrated stream of water, dealing medium Water Element damage.

Skill.Name: Reincarnation
Skill.Description: A specialty magic of a Novice Holy Clerics. Revives party member with 1 HP.

Skill.Name: Aqua Advent
Skill.Description: Channel the wrath of Lord of the Sea, deals massive Water element damage to all enemies

Skill.Name: Sacred Text
Skill.Description: A specialty magic of an Advanced Holy Clerics. Heal all party members.

Skill.Name: True Reincarnation
Skill.Description: A specialty magic of Holy Clerics only usable by a Master in it. Revives party member with Full HP.

Skill.Name: Bite
Skill.Description: Bite one enemy using rotten teeth.

Skill.Name: Ghastly Wail
Skill.Description: Screech very loudly to unbalace the enemies.

Skill.Name: Gale Cut
Skill.Description: Slice apart the enemies with the power of wind.

Skill.Name: Lighning Pounce
Skill.Description: Channel electricity around your body and tackle the enemy with full might.

Skill.Name: Mad Rampage
Skill.Description: Rampage wildly around the battlefield. Deals damage to all enemies.

Skill.Name: Decaying Breath
Skill.Description: Spat a breath so foul it melts everything it touches.

Skill.Name: Holy Purge
Skill.Description: Purge all enemies with spears of light.

Skill.Name: Radiance
Skill.Description: Focus your body's radiant glow to one enemy to inflict Light element damage.

Skill.Name: Executioner
Skill.Description: Deals heavy damage with an axe.

Skill.Name: Giga Blaze
Skill.Description: Create a thousand degree flame and focus it on one enemy.

Skill.Name: Hailstorm
Skill.Description: Call a hailstorm to damage all of the unsuspecting enemies.

Skill.Name: Hellfire Brimstone
Skill.Description: Manifest the flames of purgatory to the world.

Skill.Name: Blade of Judgement
Skill.Description: Punish the heretics with the Blade of Judgement.

Skill.Name: Ashuria Strike
Skill.Description: Focus all sense and power to deal one deadly strike to one enemy.

Skill.Name: Frenzy Slash
Skill.Description: Mad but controlled rampage around battlefield.

Skill.Name: Dark Penitence
Skill.Description: Banish the enemy into the void beyond.

Skill.Name: Ritual of the Damned
Skill.Description: Sacrifice the enemies with a dark forbidden ritual.

Skill.Name: Fount of Blood
Skill.Description: Enchant the weapon with strongest reinfrcement spell and let it loose upon the enemies.

Skill.Name: Severing Flash
Skill.Description: Sever the enemies with Blades of Light.

Skill.Name: Heavy Metal Strike
Skill.Description: Use the sword's weight and centrifugal force to deal devastating damage.

Skill.Name: Sword Hell
Skill.Description: Spin towards the enemy to slash them to bits.

Skill.Name: Unholy Reaper
Skill.Description: Summon the reaper to deal dark damage to all enemies.

Skill.Name: Dark Meteor
Skill.Description: Call down a meteor and slam it to the enemies.

Skill.Name: Overlord's Wrath
Skill.Description: Drown in rage and let it all loose upon an unfortunate soul.

Skill.Name: Break Slash
Skill.Description: Full-Powered slash to one enemy, dealing small Physical damage

Skill.Name: First Aid
Skill.Description: Beam made purely out of raw mana, dealing small Light element damage to one enemy.

Skill.Name: Multi Thrust
Skill.Description: Thrust multiple times with the lance, dealing small Physical damage to one enemy.
